DataElement.preferredName: Functional Assessment Chronic Illness Therapy Fatigue Scale Total Score
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric value to represent the total score on the Functional Assessment Chronic Illness Therapy (FACIT) fatigue scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A 13-item, symptom-specific subscale of the FACIT scales that uses a 5-point Likert scale to measure a person's self-reported fatigue while performing normal daily activities._Outcome; a phenomenon that follows and is caused by some previous phenomenon.
